oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Uniform tunic of Richard Arthur Robeson, Etowah, Tennessee
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This is a non-issue private purchase model 1912 uniform tunic. The buttons are polished bright and officer style crossed rifle insignia are pinned on the collar. On the left breast pocket are Confederate Cross of Honor, Victory Medal, and Mexican Border Service Medal. Above the pocket are ribbon bars for the national medals and the American Service Ribbon. On the lower left sleeve is a "ghost" of an overseas chevron.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
